content.raw: just made a few minor changes to style, doxygen comments, and updated migration guide. The PR looks good to me.
content.html: just made a few minor changes to style, doxygen comments, and updated migration guide. The PR looks good to me.

content.raw: Setting the default is nice. Should we set the default value for all values to match the SDF?
content.html: Setting the default is nice. Should we set the default value for all values to match the SDF?

content.raw:
An optional protobuf element has meta-information that would be removed with default values. For example, without a default value you can programmatically check if an optional element is present. This gives you the ability to send a message that doesn't set all the elements, and maintain the expectation that the system doesn't set values automatically.

We use default values when the are very important, and not liberally use them for all elements.

In this case, we should ask if a default value is needed.
content.html:
An optional protobuf element has meta-information that would be removed with default values. For example, without a default value you can programmatically check if an optional element is present. This gives you the ability to send a message that doesn't set all the elements, and maintain the expectation that the system doesn't set values automatically.

We use default values when the are very important, and not liberally use them for all elements.

In this case, we should ask if a default value is needed.

content.raw:
I believe you got this bit of code from another part of `SearchForStuff`, however it's a bit better to use:

`set (HAVE_OPENGL TRUE)`

and 

`set (HAVE_OPENGL FALSE)`

You can read more about cmake set [here](http://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.0/command/set.html).
content.html:
I believe you got this bit of code from another part of SearchForStuff, however it's a bit better to use:

You can read more about cmake set here.

content.raw:
The sdformat pull request has been merged and released in sdformat 3.5.0; we should require that version of sdformat as the minimum:

~~~
diff -r 53cb626b1825 cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake
--- a/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake	Tue Oct 06 12:32:06 2015 -0700
+++ b/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake	Wed Oct 07 10:25:33 2015 -0700
@@ -476,7 +476,7 @@
 
 ########################################
 # Find SDFormat
-set (SDFormat_MIN_VERSION 3.3.0)
+set (SDFormat_MIN_VERSION 3.5.0)
 find_package(SDFormat ${SDFormat_MIN_VERSION})
 
 if (NOT SDFormat_FOUND)
~~~
content.html:
The sdformat pull request has been merged and released in sdformat 3.5.0; we should require that version of sdformat as the minimum:

diff -r 53cb626b1825 cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake
--- a/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake    Tue Oct 06 12:32:06 2015 -0700
+++ b/cmake/SearchForStuff.cmake    Wed Oct 07 10:25:33 2015 -0700
@@ -476,7 +476,7 @@

 ########################################
 # Find SDFormat
-set (SDFormat_MIN_VERSION 3.3.0)
+set (SDFormat_MIN_VERSION 3.5.0)
 find_package(SDFormat ${SDFormat_MIN_VERSION})

 if (NOT SDFormat_FOUND)
